data.title: Great Buffet and excellent service.
data.text: The crab legs kept coming.  The boiled shrimp never got emptied.  Even the rest of the food and deserts was very tasty.  I'm picky and this place was 5 stars!  Everyone was so polite and the cost wasn't bad at all for what you got.  If you are in the area, dont miss this one, especially if you like crab legs.

data.title: Seafood buffet, plentiful crab legs
data.text: So, there was plenty of food on the buffet.  I sampled a few things, but nothing was as good as the boiled shrimp, shrimp cooked in butter sauce or the crab legs.  We ate our weight in crab legs and for the price it was worth it, $54 for two buffets on Saturday night, a tea and a beer.  People working in restaurant were very friendly as well.

data.title: EXCELLENT EMPLOYEES & SERVICE
data.text:
Be sure you check in with the BUFFET - Carey Smith and Chris Thomas are OUTSTANDING employees. ALWAYS friendly. ALWAYS go out of their way to provide excellent service.

Jon Paul - BEVERAGE server (usually on the 1st floor of casino) - another EXCELLENT and OUTSTANDING employee.

Same for ANGELA and the girls who work in Promotions/Events - EXCELLENT staff with outstanding service skills!

data.title: Decent place for a date
data.text: The food is good and decently priced. There is a fair selection of games, a mix of old and newer. My only complaints were that the elevator was slow and the machines seemed tight. I'd go back and try it again.

data.title: Nice casino
data.text: Nice buffet lunch with nice selections. Casino was quieter than most and had a good selection of table and slots

data.title: Casino
data.text: I recently went over to Boomtown while staying Horseshoe.  The Casnio has three levels and they are getting old.  I found a 0.25 ELVIS machine which I have only seen in High Roller area before.   Slots paid good especially Elvis.  I left the building before he did.  Was paying great.  My husband and I actually went over to Boomtown 3 times in our 2 day stay.   They have an awesome breakfast for $6.99

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the great review. Congratulations on yours and your husbands win! We are glad that you had a wonderful time with us and enjoyed breakfast. We look forward to your next visit.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Outdated
data.text: Boomtown Casino is like going back in time 20 years. It's kind of cool if you are into that kind of thing. However it's small, smokey, and not very clean. The parking garage is rather tight so if you drive a large pickup, be warned.

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your honest review. We will pass along this review to the rest of our team so we can correct the issues you encountered. That way your next visit with us will be the five-star stay you deserve.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: boomown
data.text:
Boomtown is a very comfortable place to stay and play, felt safe and comfortable in 
the hotel and casino. The buffet was very good with had a very good variety..

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the great review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we can't wait until your next trip.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Old dirty
data.text: Thats what this place should be called Old Dirty.  not an nice place to go from the casnio to the buffet.

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review. We are disappointed you didn't find your stay with us the experience you were looking for. We will take this review to our team so we can correct the issues you had during your visit with us so your next visit is the five-star experience you deserve.

data.title: Late night gamblin
data.text: Had a ball!!!  Not overcrowded and even at 4 am the atmosphere was still friendly and fun.  Didn't hurt that I won a little money.

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review. Congratulations on your win! We are thrilled you had a great time with us. We can't wait until your next visit.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: fun to be had
data.text: We had a nice time here. The machines were up to date and had a nice selection. We didn't win on any of them this time, but maybe next time!

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review. We are glad you had a great experience with us. We can't wait until your next visit!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Worst breakfast "buffet" ever
data.text: My husband and I visited Boomtown to play blackjack and decided we would stop in for the breakfast buffet. We expected a full buffet instead we found on the far right side a few breakfast items and 10 people in line for an omelet. After going through several dirty clean plates to find a clean one we proceeded to the line. You couldn't even get to the precooked food as the line for the omelet was the same.  The gentlemen making the omelets was trying to keep up with demand and asked his coworker for help. He laughed at him and said that's your problem. The worst managed buffet we have ever seen. After waiting for 25 min in the omelet line behind 10 people we requested a refund and left. I would not recommend this breakfast buffet.

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are disappointed that you didn't find your visit with us to be what you were expecting. We will take this review to our team so we can correct the issues you encountered so your next visit with us will be the five-star experience​ you deserve.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Downtime.
data.text: Me & my husband enjoyed the hotel , room was upgraded to a jacuzzi,  absolutely refreshing. Food delicious.

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the five-star​ review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We can't wait until your next stay with us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A Nice Surprise
data.text: The room was very comfortable.  Did not expect much after staying in the two 4 star hotels in town but came away very surprised.  The Casino was a little small. It may  not have all the bells and whistles but it was relaxed and did not have to fight the crowd around the roulette wheel.  Slots are slots.  Close to town and easy to get around.  Boomtown is in my top two and will be back.

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are glad you enjoyed your experience with us. We are honored to be among your top choices for places to stay & play in Bossier​. We can't wait until your next stay with us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Use To Be Good Seafood Buffet or Where Did All the Seafood Go!
data.text:
My wife and visited the Boomtown Cattlemans Seafood buffet on This past Saturday night as we had not been there in almost a year. Last year we had problems with the way they were putting out boiled shrimp in cold water that was melted ice that had not been refreshed. We felt it was dangerous to have this type of seafood out without proper cooling, i.e. On a bed of ice and was an invitation to getting sick. 
Well, this time was even worse, not only was there no ice but they were putting boiled shrimp out on a bed of lettuce! There were other shrimp concoctions in what looked like watered down seafood sauce as well. We looked around and they had in fact, at 7pm, very little food out and there was very limited seafood for an advertised seafood buffet. They did not have near the selections they had a year ago, including frog legs, gumbo, broiled talapia, fried catfish or several other speciality seafood dishes. They did not even have prime rib or grilled ribs but instead looked like they replaced them with a pork roast which not one was getting. Their selection of vegetables were also limited and many of them looked as though they had not been refreshed in hours, with the buffet just starting at 5pm. Examples of this problem were a salad bowl almost devoid of any salad lettuce and a pan of corn on the cob with only 2 pieces in it! 
The only positive thing about the entire buffet was the crab legs which were very good. I guess if you want to go and pay $25 for just crab legs you might enjoy the buffet. I was somewhat disgusted to see several tables of people bringing multiple plates of crab legs to their table piled 8 to 10 inches high and literally making gluttons out of themselves. But then again, I guess that is the risk that you run at any buffet and that is the disgusting side of human nature - greed! 
All in all, this is not a buffet that we will be returning to due to the poor selection and improperly presented food such as the boiled shrimp. Additionally, this casino use to give military a nice and much appreciated discount with this being a military town and area but management, we were told, has stopped this practice. Bottom line, we will not be returning to this buffet for a long time if ever.

data.title: Okay experience...but just okay
data.text: We just came to gamble for the evening but left after about an hour.  Slots were very tight (as everyone was saying)but that is why they call it gambling.   But we bailed out after encountering someone in the elevator who was actively offering two girls that he 'had up in his room available for some hot action' within earshot of the security guard who did nothing, and another extremely drunk guest who was making another female guest who was not with him feel very uncomfortable, also within earshot of oblivious security/staff.  It was a weeknight and the crowd was small, so it was not as if the staff was overwhelmed.  When I went to cash out only one window was open and I waited with those in that line, while the cashiers at two closed windows laughed and joked with the previously oblivious security guard. Also, the dark, oppressive lobby was not very welcoming. We're not prudes and  fully understand that we were in an adult venue, but it all seemed very seedy.

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your honest review Linda. We take situations like this very serious. We want to make sure all of our guests are safe and feel safe the entire time they are on property. We will take this review to the correct department managers so your next visit with us will be the five star review you deserve.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Better places to gamble
data.text: Went to see what this casino was like and chose not to gamble and left after maybe ten minutes. Few games, staff didn't seem to care if we stayed, nothing inviting about this place. Must have been one of the original casinos because it looked old and run down compared to the better ones.

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review. We are disappointed that you didn't give us the chance to show you around. We would like to invite you back so we can give you the five star experience you deserve.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Boomtown Casino
data.text: This is a good Casino - game return is fair, although we paid our due it is worth the fare for the entertainment we had there. Food is fairly good with reasonable price,

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your four star review. We are glad to see you enjoyed your stay with us. We can't wait to have you back next time.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun Place
data.text: We had a pretty good time at Boomtown, especially at the Three Card Poker table.  Plenty of slots to choose from.  Staff was pretty friendly.  Our only complaint was the absolute lack of cocktail waitresses.  There was one waitress working 2 floors.  We actually felt bad for her....once we got over the irritation of the lack of service.  We've been to Boomtown a few times and this was the first time we had this issue.

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your experience with us. We are disappointed that your cocktail experience wasn't what it should have been. We will get this review to the correct department to make sure your next experience is a five star one.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: what a dump
data.text: casino was old, smelled, workers were not friendly, poor selection of machines, will not return here

owner_response.author: Anthony C, Guest Relations Manager at Boomtown Casino, responded to this review
